Address.label: Address
Address.value: 10713 WEST SAM HOUSTON PARKWAY NORTH,SUITE 800, HOUSTON, Texas, 77064, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Patterson-UTI Energy is one of the largest land rig drilling contractors in the United States and maintains moderately sized pressure-pumping operations primarily in Texas and the Appalachian region. It also provides directional drilling services and tool rental services in most U.S. onshore oil and gas basins.
